tasks.name: API Registration
tasks.description: Register for a API key from a weather service provider (e.g., OpenWeatherMap).

tasks.name: API Integration
tasks.description:
Use JavaScript to make an asynchronous request to the weather API using the user's input (city name).
Parse the JSON response from the API to extract relevant weather information.
